alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Washington; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 9:28PM EDT until August 12 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Southeastern Westmoreland County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Fayette County in southwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 928 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Uniontown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Uniontown, Connellsville, Brownsville, South Connellsville, Farmington, Perryopolis, Seven Springs, Dunbar, West Brownsville, Roscoe, Allenport, Stockdale, Republic, Nemacolin, Vanderbilt, Dawson, Grindstone, New Salem, Chalkhill, and Ohiopyle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
